actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to the limitation on the rate of pay which may be established by the Mayor of the District of Columbia for the City Administrator.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to direct that the City Administrator be paid in accordance with the District government merit personnel system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to the limitation on the rate of pay which may be established by the Mayor of the District of Columbia for the City Administrator.
